description: Erection of new driveway and dropped kerb
decision_conditions: Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The car parking accomodation shown on the approved plans shall be provided with a hard-bound, adequately-drained, permeable, dust-free surface prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates and shall be permanently retained and kept free from obstruction thereafter. It shall not be used for any purposes other than the parking of vehicles for the occupiers of and visitors to the development.Reason: To ensure the provision of adequate off-street parking in the interests of the safety and operation of the highway network, in accordance with policy 6.13 of the London Plan 2016 and policies CS7 and DM9 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that Condition 9 (Refuse and Recycling Facilities), Condition 10( Cycle Parking), Condition 12(Vehicular Entrance Gate), Condition 13 (Sustainability and Energy Conservation), Condition 14 (Privacy Screens), Condition 15( Part M4(2) of Building Regulation) of planning permission 21/02702/FUL are hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.
